EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Data_Workshop_Roadshow_2015.Confirm - Atlanta
EmailTemplate.subject: You are Confirmed: Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Atlanta
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
EVENT NAME Tagline HEADLINE GOES HERE AND IS ALL CAPS Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal Big Data Roadshow <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/atlanta> in Atlanta. Please find the event details below:
Date: April 23, 2015 Time: Registration begins @ 8:00AM / Keynote begins @ 9:00AM / Session #1 begins @ 9:45AM / Session #2 begins @ 10:45AM / Session #3 begins @ 12:45PM Location: The Coca-Cola Company (SunTrust Garden Plaza Offices), 303 Peachtree Center Ave NE, 3rd Floor, Atlanta, GA 30308
{{my.Save The Date - Atlanta:default=edit me}}
To fully participate in the hands-on workshop, please bring your laptop with VMware Player <https://my.vmware.com/web/vmware/free#desktop_end_user_computing/vmware_player/4_0> installed and wireless connectivity enabled.
Questions? Please contact us via email <"mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://www.pivotal.io>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
